message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DL 

The paper discusses a content-based book recommending system that utilizes information extraction and a machine-learning algorithm for text categorization. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories, including Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Deep Learning (cs.DL). However, since the focus is on text categorization and information extraction, cs.IR and cs.LG are the most likely sub-categories.
